title: Knife, ca. 1700–1800
markings: On blade: spade-shaped mark, Friedr. Herder Abr. Sohn, Solingen Germany
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade (reblade) with plain bolster. Banded ferrule, round in section. Pistol-shaped porcelain handle, blue floral design on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. steel, porcelain. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-201.
